properties.help: Wireless (WiFi/WLAN) Network Interface

completionHelp.script: cd /sys/class/net; if compgen -G "wlan*" > /dev/null; then ls -d wlan*; fi

properties.constraintErrorMessage: Wireless interface must be named wlanN

properties.help: IP address

valueHelp.description: Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol for IPv6

properties.help: HT and VHT capabilities for your card
HT (High Throughput) settings
40MHz intolerance, use 20MHz only!
Enable WMM-PS unscheduled automatic power aave delivery [U-APSD]
Supported channel set width

valueHelp.description: Supported channel set width both 20 MHz only
Supported channel set width both 20 MHz and 40 MHz with secondary channel above primary channel
Supported channel set width both 20 MHz and 40 MHz with secondary channel below primary channel

properties.help: Enable HT-delayed block ack
Enable DSSS_CCK-40
Enable HT-greenfield
Enable LDPC coding capability
Enable L-SIG TXOP protection capability
Set maximum A-MSDU length

valueHelp.description: Set maximum A-MSDU length to 3839 octets
Set maximum A-MSDU length to 7935 octets

properties.help: Short GI capabilities
Spatial Multiplexing Power Save (SMPS) settings
Support for sending and receiving PPDU using STBC (Space Time Block Coding)
Enable receiving PPDU using STBC (Space Time Block Coding)

valueHelp.description: Number of spacial streams that can use RX STBC

properties.constraintErrorMessage: Invalid capability item

properties.help: Enable sending PPDU using STBC (Space Time Block Coding)
Require stations to support HT PHY (reject association if they do not)

completionHelp.script: echo If you reject non-HT, you also disable 802.11g

properties.help: Require stations to support VHT PHY (reject association if they do not)

completionHelp.script: echo If you reject non-VHT, you also disable 802.11n

properties.help: VHT (Very High Throughput) settings
Number of antennas on this card

valueHelp.description: Number of antennas for this card

properties.help: Set if antenna pattern does not change during the lifetime of an association
Beamforming capabilities

valueHelp.description: Support for operation as single user beamformer
Support for operation as single user beamformee
Support for operation as multi user beamformer
Support for operation as multi user beamformee

properties.help: VHT operating channel center frequency
VHT operating channel center frequency - center freq 1 (for use with 80, 80+80 and 160 modes)

valueHelp.description: 5Ghz (802.11 a/h/j/n/ac) center channel index (use 42 for primary 80MHz channel 36)

properties.constraintErrorMessage: Channel center value must be between 34 and 173

properties.help: VHT operating channel center frequency - center freq 2 (for use with the 80+80 mode)

valueHelp.description: 5Ghz (802.11 a/h/j/n/ac) center channel index (use 58 for primary 80MHz channel 52)

properties.constraintErrorMessage: Channel center value must be between 34 and 173

properties.help: VHT operating Channel width
Enable LDPC (Low Density Parity Check) coding capability
VHT link adaptation capabilities

valueHelp.description: Station provides only unsolicited VHT MFB
Station can provide VHT MFB in response to VHT MRQ and unsolicited VHT MFB

properties.constraintErrorMessage: Invalid capability item

properties.help: Set the maximum length of A-MPDU pre-EOF padding that the station can receive

valueHelp.description: Maximum length of A-MPDU pre-EOF padding = 2 pow(13 + x) -1 octets

properties.help: Increase Maximum MPDU length to 7991 or 11454 octets (otherwise: 3895 octets)

valueHelp.description: ncrease Maximum MPDU length to 7991 octets
ncrease Maximum MPDU length to 11454 octets

Support for sending and receiving PPDU using STBC (Space Time Block Coding)
Enable receiving PPDU using STBC (Space Time Block Coding)

valueHelp.description: Number of spacial streams that can use RX STBC

properties.constraintErrorMessage: Invalid capability item

properties.help: Enable sending PPDU using STBC (Space Time Block Coding)
Enable VHT TXOP Power Save Mode
Station supports receiving VHT variant HT Control field
Wireless radio channel
Indicate country in which device is operating

completionHelp.list: us eu jp de uk cn es fr ru

properties.help: Associate Ethernet Interface with given Media Access Control (MAC) address
Isolate stations on the AP so they cannot see each other
Media Access Control (MAC) address
Maximum number of wireless radio stations. Excess stations will be rejected upon authentication request.
properties.constraintErrorMessage: Number of stations must be between 1 and 2007

properties.help: Management Frame Protection (MFP) according to IEEE 802.11w
Wireless radio mode
Mirror ingress/egress packets
Mirror ingress traffic to destination interface
Mirror egress traffic to destination interface
Wireless physical device
Transmission power reduction in dBm
properties.constraintErrorMessage: dBm value must be between 0 and 255

properties.help: Wireless security settings
Station MAC address based authentication
Select security operation mode

valueHelp.description: Accept all clients unless found in deny list
Deny all clients unless found in accept list

Deny station MAC address
Media Access Control (MAC) address
Wired Equivalent Privacy (WEP) parameters

properties.help: Wifi Protected Access (WPA) parameters
Cipher suite for WPA unicast packets

valueHelp.description: AES in Galois/counter mode with 256-bit key
AES in Galois/counter mode with 128-bit key
AES in Counter mode with CBC-MAC with 256-bit key
AES in Counter mode with CBC-MAC [RFC 3610, IEEE 802.11i/D7.0] (supported on all WPA2 APs)

properties.constraintErrorMessage: Invalid cipher selection

properties.help: Cipher suite for WPA multicast and broadcast packets

valueHelp.description: AES in Galois/counter mode with 256-bit key
AES in Galois/counter mode with 128-bit key
AES in Counter mode with CBC-MAC with 256-bit key
AES in Counter mode with CBC-MAC [RFC 3610, IEEE 802.11i/D7.0] (supported on all WPA2 APs)

properties.constraintErrorMessage: Invalid group cipher selection

properties.constraintErrorMessage: Unknown WPA mode

properties.help: WPA personal shared pass phrase. If you are using special characters in the WPA passphrase then single quotes are required.

valueHelp.description: Passphrase of at least 8 but not more than 63 printable characters

properties.constraintErrorMessage: Invalid WPA pass phrase, must be 8 to 63 printable characters!
